name: cannon-ball_test
description: This task is an extension of the "Cannon Blast" game developed by the [Gillan Lab](https://gillanlab.com/), reported in [Donegan et al. (2023)](https://psyarxiv.com/hpm4s/). The original task represents a gamified version of the ["two-step" task](http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0896627311001255) and assesses the extent to which individuals use model-based or model-free decision-making strategies.
